name: Krok (Emeraldd Games)
description:
Free to download and test my new game Krok - 

Krok (a caveman) goes on an adventure to find some fire. Help him jump and punch his way through the world in his search for flames. Be guided by the signs pointing to "FIRE".

This is a first for me drawing all the art myself. Main level song has been recorded by Barrie Wilson. 

I am intrested in what people think about the idea of this game. Any suggestions for improvement welcome.

It is only a start - so far it is one world long - 18 levels.

X-box or playstation controller will help a lot. Keyboard W and D buttons with directions.
